ferrocarrilesDeAmericaDelSur.railways

Class Railway

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ferrocarrilesDeAmericaDelSur.railways.Railway
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bolivia, Peru

    public abstract class Railway
extends java.lang.Thread
    Defines a basic railway system, for two railways with a shared single track pass.
    Version:
    December 2019
    Author:
    Hugh Osborne

        public Railway(java.lang.String name,
               Delay delay)
        Parameters:

        delay - this railway's delay (determines the speed of the railway's train).

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public void register(RailwaySystem railwaySystem)
        Register this railway with a railway system
        Parameters:
        railwaySystem - the railway system this railway must be registered with

      • getRailwaySystem

        public RailwaySystem getRailwaySystem()
                               throws ProgrammingError
        Get the railway system this railway is registered with
        Returns:
        the railway system this railway is registered with
        Throws:
        ProgrammingError - if the railway is not registered

      • getBasket

        public Basket getBasket()
        Get this railway's private basket.
        Returns:
        this railway's private basket

      • getSharedBasket

        public static Basket getSharedBasket()
        Get the shared basket.
        Returns:
        the basket shared between all railways.

      • delay

        public void delay()
        Use delay to generate a delay for this railway

      • enterPass

        private void enterPass()
                throws ProgrammingError
        Enter the pass. This method does not check if it is safe to enter the pass. It is merely for administration of the information about trains in the pass.
        Throws:
        ProgrammingError - if this railway is not at the correct position to enter the pass.

      • leavePass

        private void leavePass()
                throws ProgrammingError
        Leave the pass. This method is merely for administration of the information about trains in the pass.
        Throws:
        ProgrammingError - if this railway thinks it does not have a train in the pass, or if there is no record of any trains in the pass.

      • choochoo

        public void choochoo()
              throws ProgrammingError
        Travel round the safe part of the railway (outside the pass).
        Throws:
        ProgrammingError - if the train is not currently at the end of the pass (and therefore at the start of the safe part of the railway).

      • siesta

        public void siesta()
            throws RailwaySystemError
        Have a siesta.
        Throws:
        RailwaySystemError - if there has been an earlier error.

      • crossPass

        public void crossPass()
               throws RailwaySystemError
        Cross the pass.
        Throws:
        SafetyViolationError - if there is/are already train(s) on the pass.
        RailwaySystemError

      • run

        public void run()
        Run the railway.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • runTrain

        public abstract void runTrain()
                       throws RailwaySystemError
        Each railway should independently define how the trains are to be run, using the basket(s). to maintain safety on the pass.
        Throws:
        RailwaySystemError - if a programming or safety violation error occurs while the railway is being run.

      • setErrorFlag

        private static void setErrorFlag(boolean errorFlag)
        Set the shared error flag (if an error occurs).
        Parameters:
        errorFlag - is true iff an error has occured.

      • errorOccurred

        public static boolean errorOccurred()
        Check the current error status.
        Returns:
        true iff an error is currently active.
